Name: Fresh Bow
LongDescription: Boosts the maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chikorita, Bayleef, and Meganium.  You can get a Fresh Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Chiko-Claw, a Chiko-Card, and a Dawn Jewel. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
